name: Love Is The Cure
description:
Printed on American Apparel Organic Cotton
Created by our friend Jordan W. Lee
Jordan is a graphic designer, he has designed for clients such as Prelandra, As Cities Burn, Jonezetta, Flurish, JustOne and ESPN.
http://www.jordanwlee.com

80% of the proceeds from this shirt will be given to Nightlight. A ministry and business in Bangkok Thailand... Helping women out of prostitution and human trafficking. www.nightlightbangkok.com
